name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly focusing on **Python**, **FastAPI**, **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, and **React**. Proficient in database management using **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**, and adept in leveraging LLM APIs and prompt engineering for enhanced application functionality. 
Skilled in both frontend and backend development, contributing to the successful deployment of cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, ensuring high reliability and performance in complex applications. Strong commitment to compliance-driven development, aligning with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Background in building AI/ML-powered platforms supports automation and real-time processing, alongside a solid foundation in MLOps practices.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed full-stack applications using **Python** (FastAPI), **TypeScript**, and **React** (17–18), ensuring high-quality deliverables and compliance with industry standards.
- Implemented robust database solutions with **PostgreSQL** and efficient querying using SQL to enhance data management and accessibility.
- Leveraged **Vue.js** and **React** for dynamic and responsive user interfaces, enhancing user experience across various platforms.
- Designed and maintained RESTful APIs to support integration with **LLM APIs**, facilitating advanced functionalities like natural language processing.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and implement prompt engineering strategies that improve application performance and user engagement.
- Conducted thorough unit and integration testing, utilizing testing frameworks to ensure reliability and performance of the applications.
- Optimized application performance by applying best practices in code quality and deploying updates in agile sprints.
- Mentored junior engineers in best practices of software development and application architecture.
- Contributed to architectural decisions and participated in code reviews, enhancing team productivity and code quality, resulting in a **30%** reduction in bugs post-launch.
- Managed deployments and CI/CD processes to streamline workflow and reduce time to production by **20%**.

• Developed and maintained applications using **Python** and **FastAPI** to ensure efficient back-end functionality in line with business requirements.
• Designed and implemented front-end solutions with **React** (v18) and **TypeScript** to create intuitive user experiences for financial technology platforms.
• Collaborated in building applications utilizing **Vue.js** for enhanced client-side interactivity and efficient state management.
• Optimized and managed relational databases with **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high availability and performance for transaction-heavy applications.
• Applied advanced data handling techniques through **SQL** for effective data retrieval and manipulation to support analytical needs.
• Participated in prompt engineering and integration of **LLM APIs** to enhance process automation and decision support systems.
• Delivered modern, responsive web applications that improved user interaction and reduced load times by **30%**.
• Implemented CI/CD practices for seamless deployment, resulting in a **20%** reduction in downtime during application updates.
• Contributed to system architecture discussions, providing insights on scalability and performance improvements based on **microservices** approach.

Leveraged **Python** with frameworks such as **FastAPI** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Developed responsive frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue.js** (3), and **TypeScript**, delivering fast user experiences on both web and mobile platforms, while maintaining SEO-friendly architecture.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** as the primary SQL database and enforced data integrity across the platform through effective schema design and query optimization.
Engineered real-time features using WebSockets, enhancing operational efficiency  by ensuring dynamic inventory tracking and responsive order updates with up to **200%** faster feedback loops.
Created and integrated AI-driven recommendation systems leveraging **LLM APIs**, significantly improving search relevance and boosting conversion rates by **30%** based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented robust authentication and authorization protocols using OAuth 2.0 for secure customer access, ensuring compliance with GDPR regulations.
Applied modern frontend technologies such as **Tailwind CSS** for styling and **Redux Toolkit** for state management, leading to a reduction in page load times by **40%** across applications.
Executed feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies through **Kubernetes** and **LaunchDarkly**, allowing for controlled rollouts and A/B testing frameworks, ensuring minimal user disruption during updates.
Employed role-based access control (RBAC) to guarantee user data privacy and maintain compliance against the latest security standards, while optimizing backend services to handle **up to 10,000** concurrent users during peak traffic.
